name: Prawn Tostadas
description: Tostadas are a delicious Mexican dish made with a crispy tortilla base, deep-fried or toasted until golden and crispy. Our baked version is piled high with prawns has a medium heat and refreshing notes of lime. Ready in 15 min, this fun, fresh, and tasty meal will have everyone smiling at the dinner table.

ingredients.name: Taco Seasoning or Ancho Lime Rub
Roasted Garlic Aioli or Chipotle Aioli

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Arrange tortillas on pan. Brush 2 tsp oil over both sides of tortillas. Bake 10 min, flipping halfway through, or until toasted and crispy.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in Sauté Pan. Add prawns and seasoning. Cook 2 min. Add water and cook for another 1 min, until water is dissolved.
Thinly slice radishes. Peel and slice avocado. Cut limes into wedges.
To assemble tostadas, divide prawns, sliced avocado and radishes, aioli, if using, and additional toppings, if desired, between tortillas. Serve with lime wedges.
tips: Instead of toasting tortillas in the oven, heat them in the Round Steamer in the microwave on high for 2 min to make quick and easy tacos.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup steamed veggies and 1⁄2 cup cooked rice.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
